text: Myristica robusta is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to the Maluku Islands in Indonesia. It is a vulnerable species threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica robusta. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
